intro_key2: In this task, you have to learn six new concepts about the dictionary.
intro_key3: Firstly, you have to read the three new concepts of the dictionary from Python's website.
intro_key5: Then you have to read three new concepts from stackoverflow.
intro_key6: You will share your understanding on a Google doc and share it with your mentor and do some questions related to concepts.
intro_key7: You will take a class in which you will explain the new concepts you have learned.
